name: constructional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to building things, and to the type of structure, materials, etc. that something has, especially a building, or part of building: Any rotten wood and related constructional cavities must be carefully cleaned. My notebook is filled with constructional details for the project.
More examplesFewer examplesMany children enjoy playing with constructional toys.Wood is one of the most elegant of constructional materials.What is the main constructional difference between the two buildings?Some serious constructional problems were encountered during the renovation.This is an excellent timber for use in constructional work.
